00011 namespace image_io

00015 class DicomChunk : public data::Chunk
00016 {
00017     struct Deleter {
00018         DcmFileFormat *m_dcfile;
00019         DicomImage *m_img;
00020         std::string m_filename;
00021         Deleter( DcmFileFormat *dcfile, DicomImage *img, std::string filename ): m_dcfile( dcfile ), m_img( img ), m_filename( filename ) {}
00022         void operator ()( void *at ) {
00023             LOG_IF( not m_dcfile, Runtime, error )
00024                     << "Trying to close non existing dicom file";
00025             LOG_IF( not m_img, Runtime, error )
00026                     << "Trying to close non existing dicom image";
00027             LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "Closing mapped dicom-file " << util::MSubject( m_filename ) << " (pixeldata was at " << at << ")";
00028             delete m_img;
00029             delete m_dcfile;
00030         }
00031     };
00032     template<typename TYPE> DicomChunk(
00033         TYPE *dat, Deleter del,
00034         size_t width, size_t height ):
00035         data::Chunk( dat, del, width, height, 1, 1 ) {
00036         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00037                 << "Mapping greyscale pixeldata of " << del.m_filename << " at "
00038                 << dat << " (" << data::ValuePtr<TYPE>::staticName() << ")" ;
00039     }
00040     template<typename TYPE>
00041     static data::Chunk *copyColor( TYPE **source, size_t width, size_t height ) {
00042         data::Chunk *ret = new data::MemChunk<util::color<TYPE> >( width, height );
00043         data::ValuePtr<util::color<TYPE> > &dest = ret->asValuePtr<util::color<TYPE> >();
00044         const size_t pixels = dest.getLength();
00045 
00046         for ( size_t i = 0; i < pixels; i++ ) {
00047             util::color<TYPE> &dvoxel = dest[i];
00048             dvoxel.r = source[0][i];
00049             dvoxel.g = source[1][i];
00050             dvoxel.b = source[2][i];
00051         }
00052 
00053         return ret;
00054     }
00055 public:
00056     //this uses auto_ptr by intention
00057     //the ownership of the DcmFileFormat-pointer shall be transfered to this function, because it has to decide if it should be deleted
00058     static data::Chunk makeChunk( std::string filename, std::auto_ptr<DcmFileFormat> dcfile, const std::string &dialect ) {
00059         std::auto_ptr<data::Chunk> ret;
00060         std::auto_ptr<DicomImage> img( new DicomImage( dcfile.get(), EXS_Unknown ) );
00061 
00062         if ( img->getStatus() == EIS_Normal ) {
00063             const DiPixel *const  pix = img->getInterData();
00064             const unsigned long width = img->getWidth(), height = img->getHeight();
00065             const void *const data = pix->getData();
00066             DcmDataset *dcdata = dcfile->getDataset();
00067 
00068             if ( pix ) {
00069                 if ( img->isMonochrome() ) { //try to load image directly from the raw monochrome dicom-data
00070                     Deleter del( dcfile.get(), img.get(), filename );
00071 
00072                     switch ( pix->getRepresentation() ) {
00073                     case EPR_Uint8:
00074                         ret.reset( new DicomChunk( ( uint8_t * ) data, del, width, height ) );
00075                         break;
00076                     case EPR_Sint8:
00077                         ret.reset( new DicomChunk( ( int8_t * )  data, del, width, height ) );
00078                         break;
00079                     case EPR_Uint16:
00080                         ret.reset( new DicomChunk( ( uint16_t * )data, del, width, height ) );
00081                         break;
00082                     case EPR_Sint16:
00083                         ret.reset( new DicomChunk( ( int16_t * ) data, del, width, height ) );
00084                         break;
00085                     case EPR_Uint32:
00086                         ret.reset( new DicomChunk( ( uint32_t * )data, del, width, height ) );
00087                         break;
00088                     case EPR_Sint32:
00089                         ret.reset( new DicomChunk( ( int32_t * ) data, del, width, height ) );
00090                         break;
00091                     default:
00092                         FileFormat::throwGenericError( "Unsupported datatype for monochrome images" ); //@todo tell the user which datatype it is
00093                     }
00094 
00095                     if ( ret.get() ) {
00096                         //OK, the source image and file pointer are managed by the chunk, we must release them
00097                         img.release();
00098                         dcfile.release();
00099                         ImageFormat_Dicom::dcmObject2PropMap( dcdata, ret->branch( ImageFormat_Dicom::dicomTagTreeName ), dialect );
00100                     }
00101                 } else if ( pix->getPlanes() == 3 ) { //try to load data as color image
00102                     // if there are 3 planes data is actually an array of 3 pointers
00103                     switch ( pix->getRepresentation() ) {
00104                     case EPR_Uint8:
00105                         ret.reset( copyColor( ( Uint8 ** )data, width, height ) );
00106                         break;
00107                     case EPR_Uint16:
00108                         ret.reset( copyColor( ( Uint16 ** )data, width, height ) );
00109                         break;
00110                     default:
00111                         FileFormat::throwGenericError( "Unsupported datatype for color images" ); //@todo tell the user which datatype it is
00112                     }
00113 
00114                     if ( ret.get() ) {
00115                         ImageFormat_Dicom::dcmObject2PropMap( dcdata, ret->branch( ImageFormat_Dicom::dicomTagTreeName ), dialect );
00116                     }
00117                 } else {
00118                     FileFormat::throwGenericError( "Unsupported pixel type." );
00119                 }
00120             } else {
00121                 FileFormat::throwGenericError( "Didn't get any pixel data" );
00122             }
00123         } else {
00124             FileFormat::throwGenericError( std::string( "Failed to open image: " ) + DicomImage::getString( img->getStatus() )  + ")" );
00125         }
00126 
00127         return *ret;
00128     }
00129 };
00130 }

00135 const char ImageFormat_Dicom::dicomTagTreeName[] = "DICOM";
00136 const char ImageFormat_Dicom::unknownTagName[] = "Unknown Tag";

00144 ptime ImageFormat_Dicom::genTimeStamp( const date &date, const ptime &time )
00145 {
00146     return ptime( date, time.time_of_day() );

00149 
00150 void ImageFormat_Dicom::sanitise( util::PropertyMap &object, std::string /*dialect*/ )
00151 {
00152     const util::istring prefix = util::istring( ImageFormat_Dicom::dicomTagTreeName ) + "/";
00154     // Transform known DICOM-Tags into default-isis-properties
00156 
00157     // compute sequenceStart and acquisitionTime (have a look at table C.10.8 in the standart)
00158     if ( hasOrTell( prefix + "SeriesTime", object, warning ) && hasOrTell( prefix + "SeriesDate", object, warning ) ) {
00159         const ptime sequenceStart = genTimeStamp( object.getPropertyAs<date>( prefix + "SeriesDate" ), object.getPropertyAs<ptime>( prefix + "SeriesTime" ) );
00160 
00161         // compute acquisitionTime
00162         if ( hasOrTell( prefix + "AcquisitionTime", object, warning ) and hasOrTell( prefix + "AcquisitionDate", object, warning ) ) {
00163             const ptime acTime = genTimeStamp( object.getPropertyAs<date>( prefix + "AcquisitionDate" ), object.getPropertyAs<ptime>( prefix + "AcquisitionTime" ) );
00164             const boost::posix_time::time_duration acDist = acTime - sequenceStart;
00165             const float fAcDist = float( acDist.ticks() ) / acDist.ticks_per_second() * 1000;
00166             LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "Computed acquisitionTime as " << fAcDist;
00167             object.setPropertyAs( "acquisitionTime", fAcDist );
00168             object.remove( prefix + "AcquisitionTime" );
00169             object.remove( prefix + "AcquisitionDate" );
00170         }
00171 
00172         LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "Computed sequenceStart as " << sequenceStart;
00173         object.setPropertyAs( "sequenceStart", sequenceStart );
00174         object.remove( prefix + "SeriesTime" );
00175         object.remove( prefix + "SeriesDate" );
00176     }
00177 
00178     transformOrTell<uint16_t>  ( prefix + "SeriesNumber",     "sequenceNumber",     object, warning );
00179     transformOrTell<uint16_t>  ( prefix + "PatientsAge",     "subjectAge",     object, warning );
00180     transformOrTell<std::string>( prefix + "SeriesDescription", "sequenceDescription", object, warning );
00181     transformOrTell<std::string>( prefix + "PatientsName",     "subjectName",        object, warning );
00182     transformOrTell<date>       ( prefix + "PatientsBirthDate", "subjectBirth",       object, info );
00183     transformOrTell<uint16_t>  ( prefix + "PatientsWeight",   "subjectWeigth",      object, warning );
00184     // compute voxelSize and gap
00185     {
00186         util::fvector4 voxelSize( invalid_float, invalid_float, invalid_float, 0 );
00187 
00188         if ( hasOrTell( prefix + "PixelSpacing", object, warning ) ) {
00189             voxelSize = object.getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( prefix + "PixelSpacing" );
00190             object.remove( prefix + "PixelSpacing" );
00191             std::swap( voxelSize[0], voxelSize[1] ); // the values are row-spacing (size in column dir) /column spacing (size in row dir)
00192         }
00193 
00194         if ( hasOrTell( prefix + "SliceThickness", object, warning ) ) {
00195             voxelSize[2] = object.getPropertyAs<float>( prefix + "SliceThickness" );
00196             object.remove( prefix + "SliceThickness" );
00197         }
00198 
00199         object.setPropertyAs( "voxelSize", voxelSize );
00200         transformOrTell<uint16_t>( prefix + "RepetitionTime", "repetitionTime", object, warning );
00201         transformOrTell<float>( prefix + "EchoTime", "echoTime", object, warning );
00202         transformOrTell<std::string>( prefix + "TransmitCoilName", "transmitCoil", object, warning );
00203         transformOrTell<int16_t>( prefix + "FlipAngle", "flipAngle", object, warning );
00204 
00205         if ( hasOrTell( prefix + "SpacingBetweenSlices", object, info ) ) {
00206             if ( voxelSize[2] != invalid_float ) {
00207                 object.setPropertyAs( "voxelGap", util::fvector4( 0, 0, object.getPropertyAs<float>( prefix + "SpacingBetweenSlices" ) - voxelSize[2] ) );
00208                 object.remove( prefix + "SpacingBetweenSlices" );
00209             } else
00210                 LOG( Runtime, warning )
00211                         << "Cannot compute the voxel gap from the slice spacing ("
00212                         << object.propertyValue( prefix + "SpacingBetweenSlices" )
00213                         << "), because the slice thickness is not known";
00214         }
00215     }
00216     transformOrTell<std::string>   ( prefix + "PerformingPhysiciansName", "performingPhysician", object, info );
00217     transformOrTell<uint16_t>     ( prefix + "NumberOfAverages",        "numberOfAverages",   object, warning );
00218 
00219     if ( hasOrTell( prefix + "ImageOrientationPatient", object, info ) ) {
00220         util::dlist buff = object.getPropertyAs<util::dlist>( prefix + "ImageOrientationPatient" );
00221 
00222         if ( buff.size() == 6 ) {
00223             util::fvector4 row, column;
00224             util::dlist::iterator b = buff.begin();
00225 
00226             for ( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ )row[i] = *b++;
00227 
00228             for ( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ )column[i] = *b++;
00229 
00230             object.setPropertyAs( "rowVec" , row );
00231             object.setPropertyAs( "columnVec", column );
00232             object.remove( prefix + "ImageOrientationPatient" );
00233         } else {
00234             LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Could not extract row- and columnVector from " << object.propertyValue( prefix + "ImageOrientationPatient" );
00235         }
00236 
00237         if( object.hasProperty( prefix + "CSAImageHeaderInfo/SliceNormalVector" ) && !object.hasProperty( "sliceVec" ) ) {
00238             LOG( Debug, info ) << "Extracting sliceVec from CSAImageHeaderInfo/SliceNormalVector " << object.propertyValue( prefix + "CSAImageHeaderInfo/SliceNormalVector" );
00239             util::dlist list = object.getPropertyAs<util::dlist >( prefix + "CSAImageHeaderInfo/SliceNormalVector" );
00240             util::fvector4 vec;
00241             vec.copyFrom( list.begin(), list.end() );
00242             object.setPropertyAs( "sliceVec", vec );
00243             object.remove( prefix + "CSAImageHeaderInfo/SliceNormalVector" );
00244         }
00245     } else {
00246         LOG( Runtime, warning ) << "Making up row and column vector, because the image lacks this information";
00247         object.setPropertyAs( "rowVec" , util::fvector4( 1, 0, 0 ) );
00248         object.setPropertyAs( "columnVec", util::fvector4( 0, 1, 0 ) );
00249     }
00250 
00251     if ( hasOrTell( prefix + "ImagePositionPatient", object, info ) ) {
00252         object.setPropertyAs( "indexOrigin", object.getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( prefix + "ImagePositionPatient" ) );
00253     } else {
00254         object.setPropertyAs( "indexOrigin", util::fvector4() );
00255         LOG( Runtime, warning ) << "Making up indexOrigin, because the image lacks this information";
00256     }
00257 
00258     transformOrTell<uint32_t>( prefix + "InstanceNumber", "acquisitionNumber", object, error );
00259 
00260     if ( hasOrTell( prefix + "PatientsSex", object, warning ) ) {
00261         util::Selection isisGender( "male,female,other" );
00262 
00263         switch ( object.getPropertyAs<std::string>( prefix + "PatientsSex" )[0] ) {
00264         case 'M':
00265             isisGender.set( "male" );
00266             break;
00267         case 'F':
00268             isisGender.set( "female" );
00269             break;
00270         case 'O':
00271             isisGender.set( "other" );
00272             break;
00273         default:
00274             LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Dicom gender code " << util::MSubject( object.propertyValue( prefix + "ImageOrientationPatient" ) ) <<  " not known";
00275         }
00276 
00277         object.propertyValue( "subjectGender" ) = isisGender;
00278         object.remove( prefix + "PatientsSex" );
00279     }
00280 
00281     transformOrTell<uint32_t>( prefix + "CSAImageHeaderInfo/UsedChannelMask", "coilChannelMask", object, info );
00283     // interpret DWI data
00285     int32_t bValue;
00286     bool foundDiff = true;
00287 
00288     // find the B-Value
00289     if ( object.hasProperty( prefix + "DiffusionBValue" ) ) { //in case someone actually used the right Tag
00290         bValue = object.getPropertyAs<int32_t>( prefix + "DiffusionBValue" );
00291         object.remove( prefix + "DiffusionBValue" );
00292     } else if ( object.hasProperty( prefix + "Unknown Tag(0019,100c)" ) ) { //fallback for siemens
00293         bValue = object.getPropertyAs<int32_t>( prefix + "Unknown Tag(0019,100c)" );
00294         object.remove( prefix + "Unknown Tag(0019,100c)" );
00295     } else foundDiff = false;
00296 
00297     // If we do have DWI here, create a property diffusionGradient (which defaults to 0,0,0,0)
00298     if( foundDiff ) {
00299         util::fvector4 &diff = object.setPropertyAs( "diffusionGradient", util::fvector4() )->castTo<util::fvector4>();
00300 
00301         if( bValue ) { // if bValue is not zero multiply the diffusionGradient by it
00302             if( object.hasProperty( prefix + "DiffusionGradientOrientation" ) ) {
00303                 diff = object.getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( prefix + "DiffusionGradientOrientation" ) * bValue;
00304                 object.remove( prefix + "DiffusionGradientOrientation" );
00305             } else if( object.hasProperty( prefix + "Unknown Tag(0019,100e)" ) ) {
00306                 diff = object.getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( prefix + "Unknown Tag(0019,100e)" ) * bValue;
00307                 object.remove( prefix + "Unknown Tag(0019,100e)" );
00308             } else {
00309                 LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Found no diffusion direction for DiffusionBValue " << util::MSubject( bValue );
00310             }
00311         }
00312     }
00313 
00314 
00315     //@todo fallback for GE/Philips
00317     // Do some sanity checks on redundant tags
00319     if ( object.hasProperty( prefix + "Unknown Tag(0019,1015)" ) ) {
00320         const util::fvector4 org = object.getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "indexOrigin" );
00321         const util::fvector4 comp = object.getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( prefix + "Unknown Tag(0019,1015)" );
00322 
00323         if ( comp.fuzzyEqual( org ) )
00324             object.remove( prefix + "Unknown Tag(0019,1015)" );
00325         else
00326             LOG( Debug, warning )
00327                     << prefix + "Unknown Tag(0019,1015):" << object.propertyValue( prefix + "Unknown Tag(0019,1015)" )
00328                     << " differs from indexOrigin:" << object.propertyValue( "indexOrigin" ) << ", won't remove it";
00329     }
00330 
00331     if(
00332         object.hasProperty( prefix + "CSAImageHeaderInfo/MosaicRefAcqTimes" ) &&
00333         object.hasProperty( prefix + "Unknown Tag(0019,1029)" ) &&
00334         object.propertyValue( prefix + "Unknown Tag(0019,1029)" ) == object.propertyValue( prefix + "CSAImageHeaderInfo/MosaicRefAcqTimes" )
00335     ) {
00336         object.remove( prefix + "Unknown Tag(0019,1029)" );
00337     }
00338 
00339     if ( object.hasProperty( prefix + "Unknown Tag(0051,100c)" ) ) { //@todo siemens only ?
00340         std::string fov = object.getPropertyAs<std::string>( prefix + "Unknown Tag(0051,100c)" );
00341         float row, column;
00342 
00343         if ( std::sscanf( fov.c_str(), "FoV %f*%f", &column, &row ) == 2 ) {
00344             object.setPropertyAs( "fov", util::fvector4( row, column, invalid_float, invalid_float ) );
00345         }
00346     }
00347 }
00348 
00349 int ImageFormat_Dicom::readMosaic( isis::data::Chunk source, std::list< isis::data::Chunk >& dest )
00350 {
00351     // prepare some needed parameters
00352     const util::istring prefix = util::istring( ImageFormat_Dicom::dicomTagTreeName ) + "/";
00353     util::slist iType = source.getPropertyAs<util::slist>( prefix + "ImageType" );
00354     std::replace( iType.begin(), iType.end(), std::string( "MOSAIC" ), std::string( "WAS_MOSAIC" ) );
00355     util::istring NumberOfImagesInMosaicProp;
00356 
00357     const unsigned short oldSize = dest.size();
00358 
00359     if ( source.hasProperty( prefix + "Unknown Tag(0019,100a)" ) ) {
00360         NumberOfImagesInMosaicProp = prefix + "Unknown Tag(0019,100a)";
00361     } else if ( source.hasProperty( prefix + "CSAImageHeaderInfo/NumberOfImagesInMosaic" ) ) {
00362         NumberOfImagesInMosaicProp = prefix + "CSAImageHeaderInfo/NumberOfImagesInMosaic";
00363     } else {
00364         FileFormat::throwGenericError( "Could not determine the number of images in the mosaic" );
00365     }
00366 
00367     // All is fine, lets start
00368     uint16_t images = source.getPropertyAs<uint16_t>( NumberOfImagesInMosaicProp );
00369     util::FixedVector<size_t, 4> size = source.getSizeAsVector();
00370     const uint16_t matrixSize = std::ceil( std::sqrt( images ) );
00371     size[0] /= matrixSize;
00372     size[1] /= matrixSize;
00373     assert( size[3] == 1 );
00374     LOG( Debug, info ) << "Decomposing a " << source.getSizeAsString() << " mosaic-image into " << images << " " << size << " slices";
00375     // fix the properties of the source (we 'll need them later)
00376     util::fvector4 voxelGap;
00377 
00378     if ( source.hasProperty( "voxelGap" ) )
00379         voxelGap = source.getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "voxelGap" );
00380 
00381     const util::fvector4 voxelSize = source.getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "voxelSize" );
00382     const util::fvector4 &rowVec = source.getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "rowVec" );
00383     const util::fvector4 &columnVec = source.getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "columnVec" );
00384     //remove the additional mosaic offset
00385     //eg. if there is a 10x10 Mosaic, substract the half size of 9 Images from the offset
00386     const util::fvector4 fovCorr = ( voxelSize + voxelGap ) * size * ( matrixSize - 1 ) / 2; // @todo this will not include the voxelGap between the slices
00387     util::fvector4 &origin = source.propertyValue( "indexOrigin" )->castTo<util::fvector4>();
00388     origin = origin + ( rowVec * fovCorr[0] ) + ( columnVec * fovCorr[1] );
00389     source.remove( NumberOfImagesInMosaicProp ); // we dont need that anymore
00390     source.setPropertyAs( prefix + "ImageType", iType );
00391 
00392     // if we dont have a sliceVec - compute it
00393     if( !source.hasProperty( "sliceVec" ) ) {
00394         const util::fvector4 crossVec = util::fvector4(
00395                                             rowVec[1] * columnVec[2] - rowVec[2] * columnVec[1],
00396                                             rowVec[2] * columnVec[0] - rowVec[0] * columnVec[2],
00397                                             rowVec[0] * columnVec[1] - rowVec[1] * columnVec[0]
00398                                         );
00399         source.setPropertyAs( "sliceVec", crossVec );
00400         LOG( Debug, info ) << "Computed sliceVec as " << source.propertyValue( "sliceVec" );
00401     }
00402 
00403     const util::fvector4 sliceVec = source.getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "sliceVec" ).norm() * ( voxelSize[2] + voxelGap[2] );
00404 
00405     //store and remove acquisitionTime
00406     std::list<double> acqTimeList;
00407 
00408     std::list<double>::const_iterator acqTimeIt;
00409 
00410     bool haveAcqTimeList = source.hasProperty( prefix + "CSAImageHeaderInfo/MosaicRefAcqTimes" );
00411 
00412     float acqTime = 0;
00413 
00414     if( haveAcqTimeList ) {
00415         acqTimeList = source.getPropertyAs<std::list<double> >( prefix + "CSAImageHeaderInfo/MosaicRefAcqTimes" );
00416         source.remove( prefix + "CSAImageHeaderInfo/MosaicRefAcqTimes" );
00417         acqTimeIt = acqTimeList.begin();
00418         LOG( Debug, info ) << "The acquisition time offsets of the slices in the mosaic where " << acqTimeList;
00419     }
00420 
00421     if( source.hasProperty( "acquisitionTime" ) ) {
00422         acqTime = source.propertyValue( "acquisitionTime" )->castTo<float>();
00423     }
00424 
00425     // for every slice
00426     for ( size_t slice = 0; slice < images; slice++ ) {
00427         dest.push_back( source.cloneToNew( size[0], size[1] ) );//create a new chunk at the end of the output
00428         data::Chunk &working = dest.back(); // use this as working slice
00429 
00430         // copy the lines into the corresponding slice-chunk
00431         for ( size_t line = 0; line < size[1]; line++ ) {
00432             const size_t dpos[] = {0, line, 0, 0}; //begin of the target line
00433             const size_t column = slice % matrixSize; //column of the mosaic
00434             const size_t row = slice / matrixSize; //row of the mosaic
00435             const size_t sstart[] = {column *size[0], row *size[1] + line, 0, 0}; //begin of the source line
00436             const size_t send[] = {sstart[0] + size[0] - 1, row *size[1] + line, 0, 0}; //end of the source line
00437             source.copyRange( sstart, send, working, dpos );
00438         }
00439 
00440         // and "fix" its properties
00441         static_cast<util::PropertyMap &>( working ) = static_cast<const util::PropertyMap &>( source ); //copy _only_ the Properties of source
00442         // update origin
00443         util::fvector4 &origin = working.propertyValue( "indexOrigin" )->castTo<util::fvector4>();
00444         origin = origin + ( sliceVec * slice );
00445 
00446         // update fov
00447         if ( working.hasProperty( "fov" ) ) {
00448             util::fvector4 &ref = working.propertyValue( "fov" )->castTo<util::fvector4>();
00449             ref[0] /= matrixSize;
00450             ref[1] /= matrixSize;
00451         }
00452 
00453         // fix/set acquisitionNumber and acquisitionTime
00454         working.propertyValue( "acquisitionNumber" )->castTo<uint32_t>() += slice;
00455 
00456         if( haveAcqTimeList ) {
00457             working.setPropertyAs<float>( "acquisitionTime", acqTime +  * ( acqTimeIt++ ) );
00458         }
00459 
00460         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00461                 << "New slice " << slice << " at " << working.propertyValue( "indexOrigin" ).toString( false )
00462                 << " with acquisitionNumber " << working.propertyValue( "acquisitionNumber" ).toString( false )
00463                 << ( haveAcqTimeList ? std::string( " and acquisitionTime " ) + working.propertyValue( "acquisitionTime" ).toString( false ) : "" );
00464     }
00465 
00466     return dest.size() - oldSize;
00467 }
00468 
00469 
00470 int ImageFormat_Dicom::load( std::list<data::Chunk> &chunks, const std::string &filename, const std::string &dialect )throw( std::runtime_error & )
00471 {
00472 
00473     std::auto_ptr<DcmFileFormat> dcfile( new DcmFileFormat );
00474     OFCondition loaded = dcfile->loadFile( filename.c_str() );
00475 
00476     if ( loaded.good() ) {
00477         data::Chunk chunk = _internal::DicomChunk::makeChunk( filename, dcfile, dialect );
00478         //we got a chunk from the file
00479         sanitise( chunk, "" );
00480         chunk.setPropertyAs( "source", filename );
00481         const util::slist iType = chunk.getPropertyAs<util::slist>( util::istring( ImageFormat_Dicom::dicomTagTreeName ) + "/" + "ImageType" );
00482 
00483         if ( std::find( iType.begin(), iType.end(), "MOSAIC" ) != iType.end() ) { // if its a mosaic
00484             if( dialect == "nomosaic" ) {
00485                 LOG( Runtime, info ) << "This seems to be an mosaic image, but dialect \"nomosaic\" was selected";
00486                 chunks.push_back( chunk );
00487                 return 1;
00488             } else {
00489                 LOG( Runtime, verbose_info ) << "This seems to be an mosaic image, will decompose it";
00490                 return readMosaic( chunk, chunks );
00491             }
00492         } else {
00493             chunks.push_back( chunk );
00494             return 1;
00495         }
00496     } else {
00497         FileFormat::throwGenericError( std::string( "Failed to open file: " ) + loaded.text() );
00498     }
00499 
00500     return 0;
00501 }
00502 
00503 void ImageFormat_Dicom::write( const data::Image &/*image*/, const std::string &/*filename*/, const std::string &/*dialect*/ ) throw( std::runtime_error & )
00504 {
00505     throw( std::runtime_error( "writing dicom files is not yet supportet" ) );
00506 }
00507 
00508 bool ImageFormat_Dicom::tainted()const {return false;}//internal plugins are not tainted
00509 }
00510 }
00511 
00512 isis::image_io::FileFormat *factory()
00513 {
00514     if ( not dcmDataDict.isDictionaryLoaded() ) {
00515         LOG( isis::image_io::Runtime, isis::error )
00516                 << "No data dictionary loaded, check environment variable DCMDICTPATH"; //set DCMDICTPATH or fix DCM_DICT_DEFAULT_PATH in cfunix.h of dcmtk
00517         return NULL;
00518     }
00519 
00520     return new isis::image_io::ImageFormat_Dicom();
00521 }
